4847.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
tosdr.tldr: As stated in the Privacy Policy: "We work with technology partners to support our website and to provide you with relevant information about the products and services of other Virgin companies both on Virgin.com and on affiliated sites or sites within the advertising networks we work with. We may use cookies on our site to help us to place relevant Virgin company advertising on third party websites when you visit those sites."
